<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Heroic Recovery](/Feats.aspx?ID=291) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 125 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[healing font](/Classes.aspx?ID=5); good alignment

</column>

---

The restorative power of your healing invigorates the recipient. If the next action you use is to cast [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) targeting a single living creature and the target regains Hit Points from the spell, it also gains three bonuses until the end of its next turn: a +5-foot status bonus to its Speed, a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, and a +1 status bonus to damage rolls.
name: Heroic Recovery
